answerText: Augie March [accept either][10] The Adventures of Augie March is by this American-Jewish author of Humboldt's Gift and Henderson the Rain King.
heading: MAGNI |2011 | 1 | 8 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: After his ship in the merchant navy is sunk, this character is stranded in a lifeboat with a homicidal maniac. For 10 points each: [10] Name this husband of Stella, who spends part of his time in Mexico trying to catch lizards with Thea. He is the title character of a 1953 American picaresque novel.
